alert.note: Alert for Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Custer County through 515 PM MDT... At 413 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 7 miles south of Sunbeam, or 9 miles east of Stanley, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunbeam and Bonanza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin
